subject: LAT
title: Senior Studies in Latin: Selected Topics
description: A selection of material from one author or several authors or an investigation of selected themes, topics, or genres at the senior level. Topics and authors may include philosophy, letter writing, history, elegy, satire, Seneca, Pliny the Younger, Tacitus, Propertius, Petronius, and Juvenal. [Note: This is a repeatable course, subject to different content; it may be completed a total of four times.]
